item.title: 朝鲜金正恩将出席中国阅兵式
item.description: 朝鲜领导人金正恩将于 9 月 3 日访华参加阅兵式，他将与俄罗斯总统普京等其他世界各国领导人一同出席阅兵式，这是一次罕见的访问。【原文：North Korean leader Kim Jong Un will visit China for the military parade on Sept. 3, a rare trip that would place him alongside other world leaders attending, including Russian President Vladimir Putin.】

item.title: SK 电讯因泄露个人数据被罚款 9700 万美元
item.description: 韩国最大的移动运营商 SK 电讯公司（SK Telecom Co.【原文：South Korea’s largest mobile operator, SK Telecom Co., was hit with a 134.8 billion won ($97 million) penalty after a cyberattack disclosed in April compromised the data of about half of the nation’s population.】

item.title: 中国银行就使用信用卡进行股票交易发出警告
item.description: 随着小投资者纷纷涌入中国，追赶中国 1 万亿美元的股市涨势，中国的商业银行正在加强对使用信用卡为股票投资提供资金的客户的监管。【原文：China’s commercial banks are tightening oversight of clients using credit cards to fund stock investments as small-time investors pour in to catch the nation’s $1 trillion market rally.】

item.title: 创纪录的国家借贷热潮推高印度债券收益率
item.description: 印度各邦创纪录的借贷正在拖累当地债券市场，推高了公司和联邦政府的融资成本。【原文：Record borrowing by Indian states is weighing on the local bond market, pushing up funding costs for companies and the federal government.】

item.title: 泰国航空公司可能因飞机短缺而停止航班扩建计划
item.description: 泰国国际航空公司（Thai Airways International Pcl）可能会推迟其航班和航线扩展计划，因为泰国的国旗航空公司无法获得足够的额外客机。【原文：Thai Airways International Pcl may delay its flight and route expansion plans because the nation’s flag carrier has been unable to acquire enough additional passenger jets.】

item.title: 英伟达首席财务官称，除非特朗普计划正式确定，否则英伟达无法支付美国 15%的税款
item.description: 特朗普政府向英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.据该公司称，特朗普政府向中国销售人工智能芯片收取15%佣金的非常规计划还没有超越早期阶段，并可能带来法律风险。【原文：An unconventional plan by the Trump administration to charge a 15% commission on Nvidia Corp. AI chip sales to China hasn’t progressed beyond the early stages and could pose legal risks, according to the company.】

item.title: 黄金连涨两日后企稳，因担心美联储独立性
item.description: 由于对美联储独立性和美国通胀风险的担忧，黄金在连续两日上涨后持稳。【原文：Gold was steady after a two-day gain on concern over the independence of the Federal Reserve and inflation risks in the US.】

item.title: 星巴克马来西亚运营商因加沙冲突而出现创纪录亏损
item.description: 星巴克在马来西亚的运营商净亏损骤降至历史最低点，原因是顾客避开了这个标志性的美国咖啡品牌，以示对加沙冲突的抗议。【原文：The operator of Starbucks in Malaysia saw its net loss plunge to a record low as customers shunned the iconic American coffee brand as a form of protest against the Gaza conflict.】

item.title: 韩国央行在对住房和贷款的担忧中维持利率不变
item.description: 韩国央行维持政策利率不变，在看到更明确的迹象表明住房、贷款和货币市场的金融失衡正在趋于稳定之前，暂不恢复宽松周期。【原文：The Bank of Korea kept its policy rate unchanged, holding off on resuming an easing cycle until it sees clearer signs that financial imbalances from housing, lending and currency markets are stabilizing.】

item.title: 中国石油巨头计划向新型燃料和精细化工转型
item.description: 中国的国有石油巨头正竞相跟上国家急速的能源转型步伐，将业务从亏损的汽油和柴油转向替代燃料和高端化学品。【原文：China’s state oil majors are racing to keep up with the nation’s breakneck energy transition, shifting operations from loss-making gasoline and diesel to alternative fuels and high-end chemicals.】

item.title: 美国和盟国加大打击朝鲜网络活动的力度
item.description: 美国、日本和韩国承诺加大力度阻止朝鲜利用海外 IT 员工为其武器项目筹集资金，并警告说平壤特工正在使用越来越复杂的策略来逃避侦查。【原文：The US, Japan and South Korea pledged to intensify efforts to block North Korea’s use of overseas IT workers to raise money for its weapons programs, warning that Pyongyang’s operatives are using increasingly sophisticated tactics to evade detection.】

item.title: 淡马锡旗下公司与 Nexus 达成收购邮政咨询公司股份的协议
item.description: Post Advisory Group 已与 Nexus Capital Management 和淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte.【原文：Post Advisory Group has reached a deal with Nexus Capital Management and a Temasek Holdings Pte. subsidiary that will reshape the ownership structure of the credit manager but keep day-to-day operations unchanged.】

item.title: 东南亚地区人民币使用量激增，新加坡大华银行面临人民币短缺问题
item.description: 新加坡大华银行（United Overseas Bank Ltd.）的一位高管表示，随着越来越多的地区经济体使用人民币进行交易和支付，人民币有限的离岸供应给该银行的运营带来了挑战。【原文：The Chinese yuan’s limited offshore supply is posing operational challenges for United Overseas Bank Ltd., as more regional economies conduct trades and payments in the currency, according to an executive at the Singapore bank.】

item.title: 印尼准备应对更多抗议活动，因为有迹象表明异议在增加
item.description: 周四，数千名工人将在雅加达和其他 38 个省举行集会，要求提高工资和降低税收，这是本周第二次大规模街头抗议活动，表明在总统普拉博沃-苏比安托上任不到一年的时间里，人们对其政府的不满情绪与日俱增。【原文：Thousands of workers are set to rally in Jakarta and 38 other provinces on Thursday to demand higher wages and lower taxes, marking a second major street protest this week that signals growing discontent with President Prabowo Subianto’s administration less than a year into his term.】

item.title: 美国就俄罗斯原油问题向印度施压，印度石油仍下跌
item.description: 由于交易商对美国迫使印度放弃购买俄罗斯原油的努力不屑一顾，石油价格走低，而更广泛的市场则呈现出风险厌恶的基调。【原文：Oil edged lower as traders looked past US efforts to force India to quit buying Russian crude, and broader markets carried a risk-off tone.】

item.title: 林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）准备筹集 7.5 亿澳元股本资金
item.description: 林纳斯稀土有限公司（Lynas Rare Earths Ltd.）是中国以外第一家所谓的 "重 "稀土商业生产商，正在寻求筹集 7.5 亿澳元（4.88 亿美元）的股权资本。【原文：Lynas Rare Earths Ltd., the first commercial producer of so-called “heavy” rare earths outside China, is seeking to raise A$750 million ($488 million) in equity capital.】

item.title: 日本的 "价值陷阱 "债券市场正在吞噬外国投资者
item.description: 去年年底，日本债券遭遇大跌，布兰登-墨菲（Brendan Murphy）发现了一笔看起来好得不能再好的交易。【原文：After a selloff slammed Japanese bonds late last year, Brendan Murphy spotted a trade that looked too good to pass up.】

item.title: 澳航公布利润增长，因需求保持稳定而订购更多喷气机
item.description: 澳洲航空公司（Qantas Airways Ltd.）报告全年盈利增长 15%，并订购了更多空中客车 SE 喷气式飞机，因为航班需求几乎没有减弱的迹象。【原文：Qantas Airways Ltd. reported a 15% jump in full-year earnings and ordered more Airbus SE jets as demand for flights shows little sign of faltering.】

item.title: 矿产资源公司因锂市场疲软而大幅亏损
item.description: 矿产资源有限公司（Mineral Resources Ltd.）全年净亏损，这家澳大利亚多元化矿业公司受到全球锂市场疲软的冲击。【原文：Mineral Resources Ltd. swung to a full-year net loss, with the diversified Australian miner hit by weakness in global lithium markets.】

item.title: 英伟达业绩不佳，美国期货下跌：市场综述
item.description: 美国股指期货周四早盘下滑，原因是英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：US equity index futures slipped early Thursday after Nvidia Corp.’s revenue outlook fell short of lofty expectations for the world’s most valuable listed company, weighing on sentiment.】

item.title: 谷歌将向弗吉尼亚州数据中心追加投资 90 亿美元
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司将在 2026 年前向弗吉尼亚州追加投资 90 亿美元，以加强该州的云计算和人工智能基础设施，这标志着美国数据中心的一系列大型科技投资中的最新一笔。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google is investing an additional $9 billion in Virginia through 2026 to enhance cloud and AI infrastructure across the state, marking the latest in a series of big tech investments in US data centers.】

item.title: 马来西亚因降息呼声而出现套利交易机会
item.description: 市场预计马来西亚中央银行将在未来几个月内降息，而经济学家则预计将按兵不动，这为利差交易提供了潜在机会。【原文：The market is pricing in a Bank Negara Malaysia interest-rate cut in coming months while economists expect a hold, presenting a potential opportunity for a carry trade.】

item.title: 新西兰航空公司全年利润下降 15%，未来前景黯淡
item.description: 新西兰航空公司全年收益下降了 15%，原因是发动机维修问题损害了收入，并表示目前还看不到立即缓解的迹象。【原文：Air New Zealand posted a 15% drop in full-year earnings as engine maintenance issues hurt revenue, and indicated there is no immediate relief in sight.】

item.title: 日本两年期债券拍卖受关注，加息赌注增大
item.description: 由于投资者认为日本央行近期加息的可能性越来越大，日本周四的两年期国债拍卖将成为焦点。【原文：Japan’s auction of two-year government bonds on Thursday will be in focus as investors see an increasing chance of a near-term interest rate hike by the central bank.】

item.title: 菲律宾将再次降息，关税给经济带来压力
item.description: 在通胀保持良好态势的情况下，人们普遍预计菲律宾央行周四将继续实施宽松货币政策，以支持经济免受美国关税风险的影响。【原文：The Philippine central bank is widely expected to continue its monetary easing cycle on Thursday to support the economy from US tariff risks as inflation remained benign.】

item.title: 绿原公司出售乙醇工厂以偿还贝莱德持有的债务
item.description: 绿原公司（Green Plains Inc.）表示，该公司同意剥离其一家工厂，以偿还贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Green Plains Inc. said it agreed to divest one of its plants to repay debt owned by BlackRock Inc. funds, as the troubled biofuels maker concluded a strategic review that explored alternatives including a sale.】

item.title: 关税推动价格上涨，咖啡饮用者面临新的冲击
item.description: 由于关税加剧了价格上涨，使期货市场有望创下十多年来的最大月度涨幅，已经为早上一杯咖啡花了更多钱的消费者无法喘息。【原文：Consumers already shelling out more for their morning cups of coffee can’t catch a break, as tariffs fuel price hikes and put futures markets on track for the biggest monthly gain in over a decade.】

item.title: 阿根廷免除比索债务，缓解受创货币压力
item.description: 阿根廷当局表示，他们在周三成功展期了一大批地方债务，通过了哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）在中期选举前遏制比索下滑战略的关键考验。【原文：Argentine authorities said they successfully rolled over a large batch of local debt on Wednesday, passing a key test for Javier Milei’s strategy to contain a slide in the peso ahead of mid-term elections.】

item.title: 受关税影响的巴西寻求墨西哥批准建立更多牛肉加工厂
item.description: 巴西更接近于获准从更多工厂向墨西哥出口牛肉，因为这个拉丁美洲最大的经济体在受到美国关税打击后正在寻求新的市场。【原文：Brazil moved closer to obtaining approval to export beef to Mexico from more plants as Latin America’s biggest economy seeks new markets after being hit by US tariffs.】

item.title: 艾伯塔省将对数据中心的计算机硬件征收 2% 的税费
item.description: 艾伯塔省计划从明年年底开始对大型数据中心的计算机硬件征收 2% 的税。【原文：Alberta plans to impose a 2% levy on the computer hardware on large data centers starting at the end of next year.】
